name: Spot Zero
tag_list: reverse-osmosis, reverse-osmosis-systems, ro-systems-manufacturers, marine-water-reverse-osmosis, seas-water-reverse-osmosis, reverse-osmosis-water-purification, reverse-osmosis-water-filtration
description: Marine Sea Water Reverse Osmosis Systems
overview:
Marine desalinator or sea water desalination, fresh water reverse osmosis systems, reverse osmosis water purification & purification systems manufacturers.

Spot Zero was conceived in 2006 to solve a demand for spot free water once and for all. Traditionally yachts would have the option of using a mobile water softener which will reduce or remove calcium and magnesium from the shore side water and replace those ions with sodium.
